head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths MALARKEY, WILLIAM E.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths MALARKEY, WILLIAM E.

block.p: MALARKEY-William E. Hendersonville, N.C., March 29, 1998, born December 29, 1930, Staten Island, N.Y. Son of the late William and Mary (Rowan) Malarkey of Rego Park, NY. Survivors include wife Judith, Howard Malarkey, sons William E.III of Chesapeake, Va., Charles J. of San Francisco, Ca., and Daniel J. of Garrison, NY; a grandson Patrick D. Marlarkey, Buffalo, NY & two brothers John, of Smithtown, NY and Thomas, of Purchase, NY. Graduate Xavier High School (1948) in New York and St. John's Law School (1954); admitted NYS Bar 1954, attorney for New York Central RR 1956 to 1961, attorney for Transworld Airlines Kansas City and New York, Partner of law firm Poletti, Freidin, Prashker & Gartner in New York; later of Counsel for Jackson & Nash and arbritrator in Office of Contract Arbritrator New York. Burial on April 4th at St. Charles Cemetery, Farmingdale. Date of Memorial Service pending.
